info.title: Items API
info.description: The Items API provides access to get and create items, and accessory data used around items.

tags.name: Vendors
tags.description: Retrieve venue and vendor information required for other calls in this API

tags.name: Items
tags.description: Operations pertaining to creating/editing/deleting items and assignment of items to locations

tags.name: Item Sets
tags.description: Operations pertaining to item sets (modifiers and instructions), and assignment of items to item sets

tags.name: Taxes
tags.description: Operations pertaining to creating/editing/deleting tax rates, tax groups, and their assignment to items and venues

tags.name: Reporting Categories
tags.description: Operations pertaining to creating/editing/deleting Reporting Categories and their assignment to items and Venues

tags.name: Item Restrictions
tags.description: Operations pertaining to creating/editing/deleting Item Restrictions and their assignment to items and Venues

tags.name: Custom Fields
tags.description: Operations to associate a value of a custom field

get.summary: Retrieves version information about the endpoint

404.description: Not Found

get.summary: Retrieves information about the Service such as app name, app version, branch name, commit id, commit tags

404.description: Not Found

get.description:
Returns complete list of vendors provided in the given credentials
List can be filtered by optional query parameters: * seat ID - internal seat identifier assigned to vendors. Useful when vendor list must be narrowed down and displayed for the specific seat only (please see */venues/{venue_id}/levels/{level_id}/seats* endpoint for complete list of seat IDs) * venue ID - internal venue identifier associated with vendors. Since the complete list contains all venues/vendors provided in the credentials this filter could be used when vendor list must be retrieved for specific venue only * external ID - external identifier assigned to vendors * include all vendors - boolean flag, true - ALL vendors are returned, false returns a list of mobile vendors only, default value is false

parameters.name: seat_id
parameters.description: Filter vendors list by seat ID

parameters.name: venue_id
parameters.description: Filter vendors list by venue ID

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: Filter vendors list by external ID

parameters.name: include_all_vendors
parameters.description: Filter vendors, true - ALL vendors are returned, false returns a list of mobile vendors only, default value is false

200.description: Returns an array of vendors optionally filtered by seat ID, venue ID, external ID or empty array if not a single vendor matches optional filters

parameters.name: filters.external_id
parameters.description: Optional query parameter to filter result set by item external ID, returning both active and inactive items

put.description: Creates or updates venue-level override for an item using the data sent in this payload, any field omited in the payload will have its default values please refer to '#/components/schemas/venueItemOverrides'. If the item is not assigned to the venue, an error is returned.

409.description: Request conflict with current state of the target resource.

patch.description: Creates or updates venue-level override for an item using the data sent in this payload, only the fields included in the payload will be updated, any field omitted in the payload will conserve its value previously stored. If the item is not assigned to the venue, an error is returned.

Content-Language.description: Reserved for future use.  Language used for the given request.

AcceptLanguage.name: Accept-Language
AcceptLanguage.description: Reserved for future use.  Language(s) accepted by the caller.  If not specified, or requested language is not available, US-English will be returned

ContentLanguage.name: Content-Language
ContentLanguage.description: Reserved for future use.  Language used for the given request.

effective_date.name: x-effective-date
effective_date.description: Reserved for future use.  The date the request should become effective.  If a future value already exists, it will be replaced with this request

venues_assigned.description: ID(s) of the venues where this item is assigned

time.description: The building date time of the app
The date time of the commit

vendors_assigned.description: ID(s) of the vendors where this item is assigned

kiosk_display.description: The name shown on Interact kiosk

description.description: A detailed description of the item
description.example: Two all-beef patties served atop a whole wheat bun and a pickle.

open_price.description: If the cashier should be prompted to input the items' price

active.description: If the item is active or inactive

restrictions.description: ID of the restrictions assigned to this item

refundable.description: !!! NOTE THIS OPTION IS OPPOSITE THE CONNECT FLAG If this item can be refunded without manager authorization

return_window.description: The number of days after the sale which the item can be returned for refund

maximum_quantity_per_transaction.description: The maximum quantity of this item which can be purchased in a single transaction

unspsc.description: The United Nations Standard Products and Services Code for the item

shippable.description: If this item can be shipped

measure.description: The unit of measurement for weighted items

weighted.description: If the item is sold by weight/volume/mass

tare.description: Tare weight to deduct from the item's weight, up to 3 decimal places

sold_out.description: If the item is sold out

sold_out_sales_allowed.description: If the selling system should allow item sales if the item is marked as sold out

receipt_trailer_message.description: Additional data appended to the bottom of the receipt when this item is sold

level_1.description: ID of the Level 1/Primary Reporting Categories

level_2.description: ID of the Level 2/Secondary Reporting Categories

level_3.description: ID of the Level 3/Tertiary Reporting Categories

quantity_required.description: If the selling system should prompt for the quantity being added to the cart

contains_alcohol.description: Indicates if the item contains alcohol

track_inventory.description: Enables Appetize Inventory Module tracking on this item

print.description: If the item should be printed on the receipt

button_text_color.description: Hex code of the button text color

button_background_color.description: Hex code of the button text color

price_override_sales_allowed.description: If the selling system should allow overriding the items price during a sale

price_override_refund_allowed.description: If the selling system should allow overriding the items price during a refund

promotions.description: Reserved for future use.  If promotions can be applied to this item

discountable.description: If discounts can be applied to this item

require_data_entry.description: If the selling system should prompt for additional data when selling this item

used_as_item.description: If this item can be sold as an item

used_as_modifier.description: If this item can be used as a modifier

used_as_instruction.description: If this item can be used as an instruction

availability_start_date.description: The date and time the item can begin being offered for sale

availability_end_date.description: The last date and time the item can be offered for sale

availability_always.description: If this item is always available, even if assigned to a day part

availability_day_parts.description: Describes day parts when the item is available for sale

availability_manual.description: Reserved for future use.  Describes manual configuration when the item is available for sale

delayed_modifiers.description: If modifier selection for this item can be delayed during itemization

taxable.description: If the item is subject to taxation

tax_rates.description: ID of the tax rates assigned to this item

tax_group.description: Tax group ID assigned to this item

calories_label.description: Calories Label assigned to this item

calories_value.description: Calories Value assigned to this item

cook_time.description: Number of seconds required to cook the item

priority.description: Display sort order used in the kitchen display system

send_to_kitchen.description: If the item should be sent to the kitchen display system

pos_categories.description: ID(s) of the POS Categories assigned to this item

attributes.description: ID(s) of the item attributes assigned to this item

linked_items.description: ID(s) of the items to automatically add when this item is sold

upsell_items.description: ID(s) of the items to be offered for upsell when this item is sold

kiosk_display.description: The name shown on Interact kiosk

description.description: A detailed description of the item
description.example: Two all-beef patties served atop a whole wheat bun and a pickle.

open_price.description: If the cashier should be prompted to input the items' price

measure.description: The unit of measurement for weighted items

tare.description: Tare weight to deduct from the item's weight, up to 3 decimal places

receipt_trailer_message.description: Additional data appended to the bottom of the receipt when this item is sold

button_text_color.description: Hex code of the button text color

button_background_color.description: Hex code of the button text color

price_override_sales_allowed.description: If the selling system should allow overriding the items price during a sale

price_override_refund_allowed.description: If the selling system should allow overriding the items price during a refund

promotions.description: Reserved for future use.  If promotions can be applied to this item

discountable.description: If discounts can be applied to this item

price.description: Price, this field will be set at the price level. Note: Null, '0', or omitting this field from the body will result in the deletion of the price override, in contrast, '0.00' means overriding value to zero

taxable.description: If taxes can be applied to this item

item_external_id.description: External identifier for the item, which may or may not be unique

item_unique_id.description: Unique identifier for the item, which may or may not be unique. Items with the same ID will be grouped together in reports

item_restriction.description: Restrictions applied to prevent an items' sale

name.description: Reserved for future use.  Name of the age restriction

active.description: Reserved for future use.  If the item restriction is active or inactive

type.description: Reserved for future use.  The type of item restriction

value.description: Reserved for future use.  The minimum age to purchase the item, applicable if the type is AGE

venues_assigned.description: ID(s) of the venues where this item restriction is assigned

parent_id.description: The Connect-assigned ID of the parent category, if any. If pos-category is root parent the parent_id should be null

display_name.description: Name to be displayed on the selling system

button_text_color.description: Hex code of the button text color

button_background_color.description: Hex code of the button text color

sales_channels.description: The sales channels which implement this POS Category (level 1 only, for any other levels this field is shown as an empty array)

manager_pin_required.description: Reserved for future use.  If a manager PIN is required to meet this restriction, applicable if the type is AGE

image.description: URI for the Appetize-hosted image file

enabled.description: If the day part is enabled for this day

begin.description: The beginning time for the day part for this day

end.description: The ending time for the day part for this day

active.description: If the tax is active or inactive

rate.description: Tax rate, up to 4 decimal places

tax_type.description: If tax should be shown inclusively or exclusively to the item price

value_type.description: Indicates how the value is computed

threshold_logic.description: Indicates the point at which taxes will be assessed

price_threshold.description: Used with threshold logic, when set to FULL, the point at which tax is applied

venues_assigned.description: ID(s) of the venues where this tax rate is assigned

active.description: If the tax is active or inactive

tax_rates.description: ID of the tax rates assigned to this tax group, all of the same tax type

venues_assigned.description: ID of the venues where this tax group is assigned

tax_group_external_id.description: !!! DEPENDENCY: ENT-8629 External identifier for the tax group, which may or may not be unique

display_name.description: Name displayed on the selling system

description.description: A detailed description of the attribute
description.example: This item does not contain eggs or egg products.

display_description.description: A detailed description of the attribute shown to consumers
display_description.example: This item does not contain eggs or egg products.

sales_channel.description: This works in conjunction with origin

item_set.description: Items which modify a parent item

active.description: If the item set is active or inactive

hidden_label.description: The label shown on the item set for kiosks when the set is collapsed

minimum_quantity.description: The maximum quantity of selections that can be made for this set.  Must be greater than or equal to maximum_quantity.

maximum_quantity.description: The maximum quantity of selections that can be made for this set.  Must be greater than or equal to minimum_quantity.

display_type.description: Indicates how the item set should be displayed on the selling system when loaded (kiosk only)

display_mode.description: Indicates how the item set selections should be displayed on the selling system

item_set_external_id.description: Unique identifier for the item set

item_set_item_id.description: The item ID for this modifier/instruction item

item_set_item.description: Unique instances of an item within an item set

item_set_item_no_id.description: Unique instances of an item within an item set

default_selected.description: Indicates if this modifier is selected by default for this set

increases_maximum.description: Indicates if this modifier/instruction contributes to the maximum quantity when selected

pricing_mode.description: If the modifier/instruction has a price, how that price should/not be included in the parent items' price

maximum_exceed_allowed.description: If the item's maximum quantity can be exceeded

maximum_exceed_price.description: Price to charge for each instance that the item's maximum quantity has been exceeded

appearance.description: How the modifier should be displayed on the selling system

maximum_quantity.description: The maximum item quantity that can be added for this item

tax_external_id.description: !!!DEPENDENCY: ENT-8628 External identifier for the tax rate, which may or may not be unique

additional_info.description: This maps to the 'Additional Info' field for the vendor role. It is used by Interact Web and other 3rd party applications to display vendor information

alcohol_enabled.description: Allows the sale of alcoholic products for the selected vendor

hours_of_operation_enabled.description: Lets the end user know if the vendor is open or closed

open_hours.description:
This ties to the 'hours of operation' field up above. Return an object containing the configured hours of operation for the vendor when set.
If not set, returns an empty array. Hours of operation are what it sounds like - the hours during the day that the vendor is open for orders. It is used to indicate whether the vendor is open or closed, instead of the vendor status of open / closed

is_pickup_order.description: Defines if orders can be picked up at the vendor. In connect you can find it under mobile ordering option under the fiel Pickup Vendor

pickup_location.description: Usually the location of the vendor/subvendor

tip_enabled.description: Indicates if a tip can be charged

venue_id.description: Identifier for the venue that contains the current vendor

open.description: Indicates if the vendor is open

dayparts.description: Set of dayparts for the vendor

order_types.description: Returns all of the order types configured for the vendor, these are user configured values but typically are things like 'For Here' and 'To Go' or 'Delivery'

external_id.description: A field for clients to write the IDs of the items in their own systems. So if they have like an inventory system of their own, they can 'link' the information.

multi_level_modifiers.description: Specifies if the vendor is using new modifiers, which is a multi level/nested schema of modifiers. Nested modifiers are items composed by other items of the product catalog instead of standalone entities (edited)

terminal_id.description: The account id of the account that is setup for the 'default mobile ordering account' inside the vendor - this is used by IW and others to communicate with other internal systems and to grab terminal role information for this vendor

seat_confirmation_enabled.description: Indicates if the vendor requires the customer to confirm their selected seat before ordering

image_url.description: URL of the vendor's configured image

active_user.description: Contains basic user information based on the userID.

scan_to_add_to_cart.description: Enables or disables Scan & Go functionality in Interact Web based on Scan to Add to Cart Flag in Connect under Vendor Role - Mobile Ordering Transactions

pickup_time_selection_enabled.description: Indicates if Order Ahead is enabled for this vendor

pickup_times.description: A list of avaibale pick up times for the vendor. Then only pickup times that are later than current time + configured prep time will be considered valid

items.description: Represents Order Ahead available Time Slots in ISO8601 format

charity_rounding_types.description: Includes rounding details for charity rounding types only

hide_menu.description: Enables or disables hide menu in Interact Web based on Hide Menu in Connect under Vendor Role - Mobile Ordering Transactions. Scan to Add to Cart must be enabled in order to have access to this toggle

seat_required.description: Indicates if the seat is required for a mobile ordering in a venue with Interact Web. This is in Connect under Settings - Mobile Ordering

limit_per_order.description: Limit set in Connect for how many alcoholic items (determined by isAlcohol flag on the item) can be purchased in a single order.

per_order_limit_reached_error_message.description: Error message for when the maximum number of alcoholic items has been added to an order. Comes up when further alcoholic items are attempted to be added to the order.

restriction_error_message.description: Alert message that should be displayed when a customer adds an alcoholic item to their cart

limit_per_order_enabled.description: Indicates if the vendor has the limit per order feature enabled or disabled

CustomFee.title: Custom Fee
CustomFee.description:
Custom Fees that can be applied to a cart.
When interacting with Custom Fees via Ordering API it is mandatory to have `Default mobile ordering account` defined in Connect and pointing to a valid Terminal account.
If this field is not set then custom fees are not going to be applied even if `Calculate Fees` flag is enabled.

type.description: Type of fee. FEE_TYPE_UNASSIGNED = 0 (represent a non assigned fee); FEE_TYPE_PERCENT = 1 (will make the fee be charged as a percentage); FEE_TYPE_FLAT = 2 (will make the fee a flat amount); FEE_TYPE_CUSTOM = 3; (Accounts for a manual flat fee)

value.description: Fee value is a number that can represent amount or percentage based on type

apply_before_discount.description: Applies fee to net or gross

auto_apply.description: From Connect. Sets fee to be automatically applied.

is_taxable.description: Value from Connect, indicating whether fee is taxable or not.

class.description: Indicates whether this is a standard fee, a gratuity charge or something else

vendor_id.description: Assigned vendor id to this fee.

OpenHour.title: Open Hour
OpenHour.description: Defines the range of time for which the vendor is open.

day.description: UNASSIGNED = 0; MONDAY = 1; TUESDAY = 2; WEDNESDAY = 3; THURSDAY = 4; FRIDAY = 5; SATURDAY = 6; SUNDAY = 7;

start_time.description: Amount of seconds since midnight that represent the open time.  This value, for its nature, is not time zoned

end_time.description: Amount of second since midnight that represent the closing time.  This value, for its nature, is not time zoned

is_charged_after_discount.description: Charge the tax after applying the discount

is_tax_on_total.description: Determines if tax is applied to total amount

DayPart.title: Day Part
DayPart.description: Day parts are time periods in which a subset of items are available that is pulled from Connect.

DayPartDay.title: Day Part Day
DayPartDay.description: The part(range of hours) of a given day when an item is available

day.description: The day of the week when the items assigned to the day part will be available

start_time.description: The hour of the day in which the availability period for items assigned to the day part starts

end_time.description: The hour of the day in which the availability period for items assigned to the day part ends

PaymentType.title: Payment Type
PaymentType.description:
title: Payment types
table:
| Payment ID | Subpayment ID| Name         |
|------------|--------------|--------------|
|0|0| Split Payment|

|11|23|Stored value - Lava|

|11|33|Stored Value - Freeway Stored Value|
|11|39|Stored Value - Vantiv Giftcard|
|11|40|Atrium|
|11|41|Atrium Debit|
|11|42|Atrium Meal|
|11|44|Freeway External Value|
|11|46|Custom PPI Integration|
|11|47|Paytronix|
|12|0|Custom tender|
|13|0|Paypal|
|14|0|Skidata Direct Payment|
|14|13|Skidata Direct Payment in Enterprise|
|15|0|Skidata Loaded Value|
|15|14|Skidata Loaded Value in Enterprise|
|16|0|Streamline aka Tin Caps Loaded value (Classic checkout only)|
|18|20|Prepaid Cards - Disney Rewards|
|19|0|Folio Charge|
|20|0|Lava|
|21|0|Alvarado (Loaded Value)|
|22|  |Tokenized Payment|
|22|22|Freeway (Tokenized Payment)|
|22|45|Elavon (Tokenized Payment)|
|23|20|Store Credit|
|24|27|Online Order|
|25| |Dining Plan|
|26|20|Virtual Card (Disney Visa Instant Credit)|
|30|35|Punchh|
|31|34|Skidata Enterprise Payments (Type 3 integration)|

OrderType.title: Order Type
OrderType.description: User defined field that describes an order type.  This is set inside connect

name.description: Contains the name of the order type associated to the previous ID field.  The name gets set in connect under the order types section and the id is internally associated when created

taxes_on_total.description: When true, the vendor's assigned taxes are applied to the subtotal; when false, each individual item's assigned taxes are calculated for each respective item

id.description: Internal id for the vendor tax.  Gets created when the vendor tax is created in Connect

order.description: Defines the order in which the tax is applied

is_active.description: Defines if the tax is applied or not.  A true value indicates that it is being applied

is_geo_tax.description: It tells if a location should be used to activate the tax.  Uses specially formatted json location file at tax creation

rate.description: Basis for the tax.  If it's ValueType Flat, and Rate is 2, it means $2 flat tax.  If it's Percent, it'd be a 2% tax

price_threshold.description: Item or order subtotal value that when reached will have the tax applied in its entirety. If tax is triggered at a 20 dollar threshold because value is 36 dollars, taxable amount is 36 and not 16 or 20

name.description: Name assigned for the tax in connect

code.description: Two digit code that get printed in the receipt.  It is defined by the user in the tax creation process

VendorTaxThresholdLogic.description: Determines at what point to apply the tax.  See price threshhold for further explanation (OAPI doesn't handle this right now) THRESHOLD_LOGIC_UNASSIGNED = 0; THRESHOLD_LOGIC_FULL = 1; THRESHOLD_LOGIC_ABOVE = 2; THRESHOLD_LOGIC_BELOW = 3;

VendorTaxType.description: Predefined tax value to determine if the tax is inclusive or exclusive. Inclusive tax is already accounted in the items prices, exclusive does not. TAX_TYPE_UNASSIGNED = 0; TAX_TYPE_INCLUSIVE = 1; TAX_TYPE_EXCLUSIVE = 2

VendorTaxValueType.description: Defines if the tax is a flat, percentile or table tax.  If it is a table tax, it gets determined by subsets of value ranges for the sale amount(low end value and high end value setup in connect when creating the tax) TAX_VALUE_TYPE_UNASSIGNED = 0; TAX_VALUE_TYPE_PERCENTAGE = 1; TAX_VALUE_TYPE_FLAT = 2; TAX_VALUE_TYPE_TABLE = 3;

id.description: Internal system id associated to the category

display_name.description: Associated name for the category.  Get assigned at creation time

level.description: POS categories can be nested.  This value defines their depth level.  LEVEL_UNSPECIFIED = 0; LEVEL_ONE = 1; LEVEL_TWO = 2; LEVEL_THREE = 3;

parent_category_id.description: In case of nested categories, a child category will include here the id of the immediate parent category id

sort_order.description: Defines the order in which the category gets displayed

sales_channel.description: Field used to filter sales.  It is usually POS or KIOSK

image_icon.description: Defines the icon path.  Normally a .png file

enabled.description: Tells if the rounding is enabled or disabled

allowed_payment_type.description: Describes the allowed payment.  Option is set in Connect

message.description: Message to display for the type at terminal

title.description: Title that displays at the terminal for the type

hash.description: Verification hash.  Generated from Connect's signing key internally

Image.title: Image
Image.description: Contains the url paths for an image

image_full_res.description: Path for the full resolution image

image.description: Path for the commonly used image

message.description: A human-readable response, used for both successful and failed requests.

location.description: A fully qualified URI for retrieving a newly created resource.

Unauthorized.description: User is not logged in or otherwise has not supplied valid credentials

BadRequest.description: A value supplied in the payload does not conform to the expected type, is unpermitted, or otherwise not able to be used.

InternalServerError.description: An error occurred within the service unrelated to the request content.  It may contain more in-depth error information
